name: Seattle Sports 225g Bear Spray Holster
description: Keeps your bear spray within reach. You may never need it, but if you do, chances are you'll need it in a hurry. This rugged nylon holster allows you to carry your spray on a belt or pack strap.Hook-and-loop flap is easy and fast to open.Fits most 225g bear spray canisters (canister not included).
